com.samsung.android.sdk.pen.engine

Interface SpenCapturePageInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SpenCapturePage

    public interface SpenCapturePageInterface
    The interface for SpenCapturePage class.
    Since:
    5.0.0

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Bitmap capturePage(float ratio)
      Get the bitmap of the current page at the specified resizing ratio.
      Bitmap captureRect(RectF rect)
      Get the bitmap of the specified area.

    • Method Detail

      • setPageDoc

        void setPageDoc(SpenPageDoc pageDoc)
        Set the specified SpenPageDoc instance.
        Parameters:
        pageDoc - The SpenPageDoc instance.
        Since:
        3.0.0

      • compressPage

        void compressPage(String filename,
                  float ratio)
        Compress the current page into a PNG file with the specified file name and the specified resizing ratio.
        Parameters:
        filename - The file name for the PNG file that you want to create
        ratio - The resizing ratio for the PNG file. Ratio must be greater than 0 and below 5. ( 0 < ratio <= 5)
        Throws:
        OutOfMemoryError - if not enough memory to create compress bitmap
        IllegalArgumentException - if create bitmap with size exceeds 32bits or if create bitmap failed when invalid data
        Since:
        3.0.0

      • captureRect

        Bitmap captureRect(RectF rect)
        Get the bitmap of the specified area. Destroy the bitmap after use to prevent memory leaks.
        Parameters:
        rect - The area to capture.
        Returns:
        The captured Bitmap.
        Throws:
        OutOfMemoryError - thrown if not enough memory to create captured .
        Since:
        3.0.0

      • capturePage

        Bitmap capturePage(float ratio)
        Get the bitmap of the current page at the specified resizing ratio. Ratio must be greater than 0 and below 5. ( 0 < ratio <= 5) Destroy the bitmap after use to prevent memory leaks.
        Parameters:
        ratio - The ratio when capture page
        Returns:
        The captured Bitmap of the current page.
        Throws:
        OutOfMemoryError - thrown if not enough memory to create captured bitmap.
        Since:
        3.0.0

      • close

        void close()
        Close the captured page. Call this method when you are done working with the captured page to prevent memory leaks.
        Since:
        3.0.0

      • setHyperTextViewEnabled

        void setHyperTextViewEnabled(boolean enable)
        Enable or disable the hypertext view.
        Parameters:
        enable - Set to true to enable the hypertext view, set to false to disable the hypertext view.
        Since:
        3.0.0

      • isHyperTextViewEnabled

        boolean isHyperTextViewEnabled()
        Check if the hypertext view is enabled.
        Returns:
        true - if the hypertext view is enabled. false - if the hypertext view is not enabled.
        Since:
        3.0.0

      • setThumbnailEnabled

        void setThumbnailEnabled(boolean enable)
        Enable or disable storing the thumbnail.
        Parameters:
        enable - Set to true to enable the thumbnail, set to false to disable the thumbnail.
        Since:
        4.0.0

      • isThumbnailEnabled

        boolean isThumbnailEnabled()
        Check if the thumbnail is enabled.
        Returns:
        true - if the thumbnail is enabled. false - if the thumbnail is not enabled.
        Since:
        4.0.0
